code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User as User
    participant CP as ChatPage.jsx
    participant UC as useChat.js
    participant API as api.js
    participant Router as chat.py
    participant CS as ChatService
    participant DAL as MongoDAL
    participant MCP as MCP Server (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    participant Azure as Azure OpenAI
    participant DB as MongoDB

    User->>CP: Type message + Send
    CP->>UC: sendMessage(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    UC->>API: askStream(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    API->>Router: POST /api/chat/ask_stream
    
    Router->>DAL: get_chat_memory(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    DAL->>DB: find_one(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker})
    DB-->>DAL: ChatMemory
    DAL-->>Router: ChatMemory (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    
    Router->>DAL: add_message_to_chat(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    DAL->>DB: update_one (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    DB-->>DAL: OK
    
    Router->>CS: get_agent_response_stream(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    CS->>MCP: Spawn MCP subprocess (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    MCP->>Azure: Query with RAG context
    
    loop Streaming Response
        Azure-->>MCP: Token chunk
        MCP-->>CS: Token chunk
        CS-->>Router: yield chunk
        Router-->>API: SSE: data: chunk
        API-->>UC: onChunk(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
        UC-->>CP: Update UI (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
    end
    
    Router->>DAL: add_message_to_chat(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
    DAL->>DB: update_one (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    DB-->>DAL: OK
    
    Router-->>API: Stream complete
    API-->>UC: Done
    UC-->>CP: Final render
    CP-->>User: See complete response
repo_description: This repo contains a multi-agent system with multiple AI models that serves to be an assistant about me and my professional experience.
